{{taskdDetails.description}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TaskService } from '../../Services/task.service'; import { task } from '../../Models/task'; @Component({ selector: 'task-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private service:TaskService){ } taskId:number=5; taskdDetails:task|undefined; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getTaskDetails(this.taskId).subscribe((res)=>{ this.taskdDetails=res; }) } }
